attributes.action: put forward a substantive motion to the chamber for the vote of no confidence in Speaker Michael Martin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for all those who justly feel that the Speaker of the Commons, one Michael Martin has not exercised his most basic of duties and would call for a replacement to be democratically elected by secret ballot by the members of the house

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
